description:
Send a text message with payload which is not valid UTF-8 in one fragment.

Payload: 0x808182838485868788898a8b8c8d8e8f909192939495969798999a9b9c9d9e9fa0a1a2a3a4a5a6a7a8a9aaabacadaeafb0b1b2b3b4b5b6b7b8b9babbbcbdbe
expectation: The connection is failed immediately, since the payload is not valid UTF-8.
httpRequest:
GET /runCase?case=119&agent=PocketSocketClient HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:9001
Sec-WebSocket-Key: cSvfCHnagBiAf8AWTNBhHg==
Sec-WebSocket-Version: 13
Upgrade: websocket
Origin: http://localhost:9001
Sec-WebSocket-Extensions: permessage-deflate; client_max_window_bits
Connection: upgrade
httpResponse:
HTTP/1.1 101 Switching Protocols
Server: AutobahnTestSuite/0.7.5-0.10.9
X-Powered-By: AutobahnPython/0.10.9
Upgrade: WebSocket
Connection: Upgrade
Sec-WebSocket-Accept: QjBVdxf8in5MtxGHxaGpQzRluKQ=
result: Actual events match at least one expected.
wasNotCleanReason: peer dropped the TCP connection without previous WebSocket closing handshake
